index.name: java
index.subtitle: Java
index.about: Java is the foundation for virtually every type of networked application and is the global standard for developing and delivering embedded applications, games, Web content, and enterprise software. With more than 9 million developers worldwide, Java enables you to efficiently develop and deploy exciting applications and services.
index.description: Read the best free ebooks about Java language.

books.title: Neural Network Programming with Java
books.description: Neural networks are very intelligent algorithmic systems. Learn how to create them with Java with this guide dedicated to cutting-edge neural network development.
books.author: Alan M. Souza & Fabio M. Soares

books.title: Think Java
books.description: Think Java is an introduction to computer science and programming intended for people with little or no experience. We start with the most basic concepts and are careful to define all terms when they are first used.
books.author: Allen Downey

books.title: Core Java - DZone Refcard
books.description: This free, 6-page cheat sheet gives you an overview of key aspects of the Java language and references on the core library, commonly used tools, and new Java 8 features.
books.author: Cay Hortsmann & Ivan Ivanov

books.title: Learn Programming with Java
books.description: Online Tutorial and Challenges to learn the basics of Java programming.
books.author: Learneroo

books.title: The Java® Language Specification Java SE 8 Edition
books.description: Written by the inventors of the Java Language Specification. This book provides complete and detailed coverage of the Java 8 programming language.
books.author: Oracle

books.title: The Java® Virtual Machine Specification Java SE 8 Edition
books.description: Written by the inventors of the Java Virtual Machine Specification. This book provides complete and detailed coverage of the Java Virtual Machine 8.
books.author: Oracle

books.title: Java e Orientação Objetos
books.description: This is a free ebook which shows the main concepts about Object Oriented Programming using Java language.
books.author: Caelum

books.title: Java para Web
books.description: This is a free ebook which shows the main concepts about web developing system using JavaEE.
books.author: Caelum

books.title: Java Tests, JSF e Design Patterns
books.description: This is a free ebook which shows useful frameworks for testing, JSF for Java Web and the principles about Design Patterns for Java.
books.author: Caelum

books.title: Algoritmos e Estrutura de Dados com Java
books.description: This is a free ebook which shows the main algorithms and data structures examples using Java language.
books.author: Caelum
